mapper.insert: merge upms_permission as t using (select *, (select max(orders) from upms_permission where pid = temp.pid) as orders from (select #{obj.id} as id, '40288fcb722b7518017234e294cb0000' as system_id, (select id from upms_permission where name = #{obj.pname}) as pid, #{obj.name} as name, #{obj.type} as type, #{obj.permissionValue} as permission_value, #{obj.uri} as uri, #{obj.ctime} as ctime ) as temp) s on s.name = t.name and (s.pid is null or s.pid = t.pid) when not matched then insert (id, system_id, pid, name, type, permission_value, uri, orders, status, ctime) values (s.id, s.system_id, isnull(s.pid, '1'), s.name, s.type, s.uri, s.permission_value, isnull(s.orders, 0) + 1, 1, s.ctime);
